DOC.brief_summary: The objective study assess efficacy safety 12 month treatment 300 IR STG320 sublingual tablet compare placebo adult adolescents HDM-associated allergic rhinitis .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety STG320 Sublingual Tablets House Dust Mite ( HDM ) Allergen Extracts Adults Adolescents With HDM-associated Allergic Rhinitis
DOC.criteria: Main Patients HDMassociated allergic rhinitis ( AR ) least 1 year Patients sensitize D. pteronyssinus ( D. pte ) and/or D. farinae ( D. far ) define skin prick test HDMspecific serum IgE Main A history rhinitis , rhinoconjunctivitis asthma allergens HDM , likely result rhinitis symptom evaluation period Partly control uncontrolled asthma Controlled asthma require controller treatment ( ) consistent GINA 2014 treatment Steps 3 5
